page.title: 01INTRODUCTION TO BUNGAY AREA
page.content: Bungay is a small,rural market town supporting three villages,Mettingham, Earsham and Ditchingham.It has a population of 4,000 and is steadily growing in size.The area relies on tourism,agriculture and light industry. The River Waveney runs through the town marking part of the border between Norfolk and Suffolk.The town is well served regarding schools and recreati - onal facilities,and has a good variety of shops.There is a small weekly market.There are good road links with Norwich,Ipswich and Gt. Yarmouth. Our squares include several conserva - tion areas,of both historical and environmental significance.
